nodes.text: Fluffy was a cat who lived during the time of the Clone Wars. During the conflict, the Heroes of Cularin traveled through Tolea Biqua, on Genarius, to meet with Riboga the Hutt. To get an idea of what people they were, he arranged for them to encounter a series of situations and for one of them, he had a little girl go and ask them to rescue Fluffy, who was stuck up a tree.
